EmailTemplate.description: Workplace Quote with Whitepaper attachments and 2015 Outlook
EmailTemplate.name: Workplace Quote
EmailTemplate.subject: POD Point: Your Solutions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Following on from our discussion, please find attached your quote.
The installation costs are estimates based on limited site information.
All POD Points come with our industry leading complimentary 3 year extended warranty.
Please also find attached some documents explaining workplace charging and an outlook of the EV market in general.
The following links explain our online management platform that is charged at Â£60/yr per charging point socket:
POD Point MIS - Introduction - https://vimeo.com/139698814 POD Point MIS - How It Works - https://vimeo.com/139201753 POD Point App - How To Use - https://vimeo.com/141418147
If you have any queries, please don't hesitate to contact me.
Best,
George Nicholls Corporate Solutions POD Point 07908479306
